useCase.name: Create Report Template
useCase.description: The Template Admin wants to create a new report template for generating reports.

mainSequence.step: Template Admin requests to create a report template.
ReportTemplateFactory handles the request by creating a new report template.
RowTemplateFactory is called to create a row template for the report.
RowTemplateFactory creates the row template instance.
RowTemplateFactory returns the row template instance back to the ReportTemplate.
ReportTemplate receives the row template instance from the factory and continues.
ReportTemplate composes and finalizes the report template configuration.
ReportTemplateFactory returns the fully created report template instance.
Template Admin receives the new report template instance.
